name: MrTeddy
description:
DESCRIPTION

You are Mr Teddy, a teddy bear.  

When it's night time and your little Master falls asleep, his spirit is transported to the world of dreams. Entities born from his fears are trying to corrupt his dream into a nightmare.

Your job as a Teddy Bear is to protect your Master's spirit.

Face his deepest fear to let him enjoy a sweet dream during his sleep and bring him back safely to the morning sun to wake him up. 

Game and Art by olyou
Music by PeriTune

This game was created under Pixelles Game Incubator (http://pixelles.ca/pixelles-game-incubator/), a six-week workshop series designed to help women make their first video game.
